meanings.definition: Not characteristic of a scholar or scholarship.
meanings.sent1: Her unscholarly behavior in class surprised the teacher.
meanings.sent2: The student's unscholarly attitude towards studying led to poor grades.
meanings.sent3: It was unscholarly of him to forget his homework on the first day of school.
meanings.sent4: The unscholarly approach to the project resulted in incomplete research.
meanings.sent5: The unscholarly conduct of the group was evident during the presentation.

meanings.definition: Lacking in scholarly qualities or attributes.
meanings.sent1: The book's unscholarly content made it difficult to use for research.
meanings.sent2: His unscholarly writing style lacked depth and analysis.
meanings.sent3: The unscholarly paper was filled with spelling errors and incorrect facts.
meanings.sent4: She received an unscholarly grade on her essay due to plagiarism.
meanings.sent5: The unscholarly approach to the topic left the audience confused.
